ball.description: It's been hard to interest Felix in sports, but Milo goes crazy when we play ball.  He seems to be overjoyed that he can participate in something.
ball.title: Ball

bananas1.description:
For a month and a half Milo's been refusing rice cereal mush, which we interpreted as him not being ready to eat solid food. Turns out he just hates the taste. He's been holding out for banana mush.

He'll be six months old tomorrow, the exact age that Felix started solid food.
bananas1.title: Bananas 1

bedtime1.description: Felix gets two bedtime stories.  He generally chooses one and we choose the other.  Sometimes he declares that one parent is the only one who can possibly read a certain book.  Dean is that special someone for Curious George, which we're reading here.
bedtime1.title: Bedtime 1

bedtime2.description: Dean might be the chosen one because he has a better monkey screech than Lucie.
bedtime2.title: Bedtime 2

castle.description: Typical playtime:  astronauts rescuing princesses from Lego castles.
castle.title: Castle

crawl.description:
When Milo wants to move fast, he does a commando-style crawl. However, he knows there's a more elegant way to crawl and he generally tries to figure it out by starting with a push-up.

Milo can also go from lying down to sitting all by himself, via this position.
crawl.title: Crawl

dunk.description: Felix imitates Dean dunking his croissant in his coffee.  He doesn't seem to mind that his beverage is plain water.
dunk.title: Dunk

flossing.description:
Felix had his first trip to the dentist, and what a trip it was. Two cavities in his front teeth, because they overlap a bit. Felix was amazingly cool about the whole ordeal; he breathed his nitrous and kept his mouth open and didn't cry at all. He earned a trip to the toy store for such braveness.

And now, as pictured below, we floss every night.
flossing.title: Flossing

mikek1.description: Party at Mike's.  Janice gets some Milo.
mikek1.title: Mikek 1

mikek2.description: Felix and Evan test Dean's maximum capacity.
mikek2.title: Mikek 2

mikek3.description: Dean and Felix test Austin's maximum capacity.
mikek3.title: Mikek 3

mikek4.description: Evan's first video game AND his first video game addiction.
mikek4.title: Mikek 4

mosesbasket1.description:
Milo's sitting more and more.

He sleeps in his crib now, and his Moses basket has been converted to toy central.
mosesbasket1.title: Mosesbasket 1

mosesbasket2.description: His basket of toys doesn't interest him nearly as much as anything of Felix's.
mosesbasket2.title: Mosesbasket 2

phoebe1.description: Phoebe has a swing in her garden. Milo approves.
phoebe1.title: Phoebe 1

phoebe3.description: What could be more lovely than a garden tea party on a uncommonly warm winter day?
phoebe3.title: Phoebe 3

torin1.description: Torin and Felix put the "date" in "play date".
torin1.title: Torin 1

zoo.description: The Oakland zoo is cute and cuddly.  You can see just about everything in an hour.  This marks the first time that Felix has gone without a stroller.
zoo.title: Zoo

description:
This website prides itself on accuracy and factualness, so it pains us to have to publish a correction: last month we extensively documented Milo's first meal. It was, in fact, premature to call it his first meal: he didn't really eat it. Today was actually his first real solid food. It was banana mush, and he cleaned his plate (with his forehead).

Dean is greatly enjoying his time off. Lots of exercise, playing with the kids, seeing friends, and video games.
title: January 23
